text: Jenumanja (Asilamu) m'bele nkutula wambone nnope waukoposyedwe (pakusagulidwa chilikati cha mikutula josope kuti uŵe wakamuchisya) ku ŵandu, nkulamulaga (kutenda) yambone ni nkukanyaga yakusakala, soni ni nkukulupililaga mwa Allah. Mwanti ŵaŵapedwile chitabu (Ayuda ni Akilisito) ingaŵe ŵakulupilile (pakunda Usilamu), ingaliji yambone kukwao, ŵane mwa jamanjao ŵana chikulupi, nambo ŵajinjio ŵakunyosya
